AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Domestic Scientist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The owner of {PAWN_nameDef} was a highly educated person. He taught {PAWN_nameDef} various subjects in their spare time.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Domestic Chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was a personal chef for {PAWN_possessive} owner's family. {PAWN_pronoun} has mastered art of the cooking and is able to make perfect meals using the simplest ingredients.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Domestic Jade
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was used by {PAWN_possessive} owners mostly for sexual purposes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Domestic Singer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was a personal singer for {PAWN_possessive} owner. Every evening {PAWN_nameDef} pleased {PAWN_possessive} owner with charming songs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Glitterworld star
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was a popular celebrity at one of the glitterworlds. {PAWN_pronoun} has often visited various shows, holidays and photosessions.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Glitterworld Scientist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} became a professional scientist despite {PAWN_possessive} species being servitor. {PAWN_possessive} vast knowledge combined with high intellect allowed {PAWN_objective} to develop almost anything from scratch.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rebel
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} participated in revolts at a distant industrial world and managed to escape.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gun merchant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was a successful gun merchant in the past. {PAWN_pronoun} knows everything about big guns and shooting.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Domestic Bartender
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was a domestic bartender in past. {PAWN_pronoun} knows a lot about drinks and what to do in cases of poisoning and overdose.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Best Friend
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was the best friend for {PAWN_possessive} owner. {PAWN_pronoun} was the only thing that kept owner happy...

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Book Worm
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef}'s owner had a vast library with all kinds of books and digital archives. {PAWN_pronoun} had visited library and fulfiled {PAWN_possessive} curiosity in secret each night...

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Domestic Gardener
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was a domestic gardener. {PAWN_pronoun} knows a lot about plants and gardering.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rimworlder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} had spent an entire life on a rimworld. {PAWN_pronoun} learned skills that are necessary for survival in such a harsh place.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Apathetic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} does not like to talk much. Sometimes {PAWN_pronoun} stays silent for weeks. Nobody knows why. Honestly, {PAWN_pronoun} prefers to spend free time with animals.
